Name: Coal Ring
LongDescription: Boosts maximum PP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Magby, Magmar, and Magmortar.  You can get a Coal Ring at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Magby Claw, a Magby Card, and an Ember Jewel. That's the easy way! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
